name: Indian Ocean: Live
description:
Bengaluru, mark your calendars — August 23rd, 7 PM onwards.

Indian Ocean live at Hamilton Cocktail Bar, Whitefield.

Brace yourself for a soul-stirring night as Indian Ocean, India’s iconic folk-rock powerhouse, takes the stage at Hamilton for an unforgettable live performance.
From Kandisa to Bandeh, experience the sound that defined a generation — raw, powerful, and deeply rooted in the Indian spirit.
Pair the performance with our signature cocktails and electric vibe.

name: Make Origami Boxes
description:
Join us for a hands-on introduction to the art of origami boxes. In this beginner-friendly workshop, we’ll explore the fundamentals of paper folding and create functional boxes of various shapes and sizes. We’ll explore basic folding techniques and learn how to create boxes that can hold small objects, gifts, or just sit beautifully on your desk.
All materials will be provided. Feel free to bring your own patterned/ colored papers/ used gift wrapping papers / paper bags to make the boxes.

name: Learn to Make Origami Boxes
description:
In this beginner-friendly workshop, we’ll explore the fundamentals of paper folding and create functional boxes of various shapes and sizes. We’ll explore basic folding techniques and learn how to create boxes that can hold small objects, gifts, or just sit beautifully on your desk.

All materials will be provided. Feel free to bring your own patterned/ colored papers/ used gift wrapping papers / paper bags to make the boxes.

General Rules :
- Ages 10 and above
- All materials will be provided
- Contact 9513222681 for more details.

name: Sis X Tenzee Hyrox Bootcamp- Women Only
description:
Unleash the Athlete in You!
Join us for an electrifying Hyrox Bootcamp at Tenzee Multisports, where endurance meets strength in the ultimate fitness challenge. Whether you're preparing for your next Hyrox event or just looking to level up your functional fitness, this bootcamp is designed to push your limits and transform your performance.
Expect a high-energy mix of:
Functional strength training
Cardio intervals
Mobility drills
Race-style circuits modeled on real Hyrox events

Open to all fitness levels, this bootcamp is perfect for athletes, CrossFitters, weekend warriors, and anyone ready to test their grit in a community-driven environment. 
Contact: Vaishnavi - 6380349608

name: DOGA - Yoga With Your Furry Friends(Women Only)
description:
DOG +YOGA = DOGA!
Whether you're a paw-rent or just a dog lover, this one's for you!
Join us for a paws-itively calming yoga session where you can flow with your furry friend — or simply soak in the good vibes solo.
10th August
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM
DizzyDuck Studio, Koramangala
Refreshments included post-session!
No dog? No problem. Just come and unwind with like-minded humans and happy tails!

name: Run+Brekkie-(Women Only)
description:
RUN + BREKKIE 
Date: Sunday, 10th August
Time: Meetup at 6:30 AM followed by breakfast after
Location: 1105, Shreyas, 13th cross. Indiranagar, 560038

Lace up and kickstart your Sunday morning the best way — with a refreshing community run followed by a delicious breakfast spread!

Run Wild, Fuel Wise 
Whether you're a seasoned runner or just looking for a fun way to stay active, this is your sign to get moving, meet like-minded folks, and treat yourself to some brekkie goodness after from ANOMALY

What’s included in your breakfast:
Croissant Sandwich (Veg/Non-Veg)
Blueberry Custard Tart
Hot Coffee

Bring your energy, your friends (or come solo!), and let’s start the day strong — together.
No better way to fuel your weekend. See you at the start line!

Contact Information
Vaishnavi-6380349608

name: Cheese Platter Workshop
description:
Join us for a hands-on Cheese-Making Masterclass where you’ll learn how to make cream cheese from scratch and explore three irresistible flavors: Cranberry & Pistachio, Herbed Garlic, and Toasted Sesame. This fun, beginner-friendly workshop will guide you through the entire process, from creating your cheese to learning elegant plating techniques that will make your creations stand out. By the end of the session, you’ll have your very own stunning cheese platter to carry home and show off!
Perfect for Hosts- Elevate your hosting skills and impress your guests with homemade gourmet cheese.

name: OriginalDog presents Unfiltered: Blues
description:
“For me there is something primitively soothing about this music, and it went straight to my nervous system, making me feel ten feet tall.”
― Eric Clapton

What is about this genre of music that evokes so much emotion? What is the history behind the evolution of this musical form?

OriginalDog presents 'Unfiltered', is an evening of discovering something new, having an unique experience and in the process have a new unfiltered view of this world. Join us as we journey into the world of the Blues.

Writer and blues enthusiast Kavya Murthy will take us on an audio-visual journey through the history of the Blues.

Also joining us will be Bruce from TAAQ, who will share some of his latest experiments with blues-y forms, and perhaps even share a song or two, live!

See you at Unfiltered!

name: Jigsaw Junkies by Playful Pursuits
description:
When was the last time you put a jigsaw puzzle together? Puzzles are for everyone! Whether you loved puzzles as a kid or enjoy them now; do them solo or with friends and family; take your time or love to blitz a puzzle - Jigsaw Junkies is for you!

Join us for a relaxed, off-screen afternoon in a social setting while you put together beautiful images. We’ve partnered with some of India’s most innovative puzzle companies to bring you new and exciting jigsaws to solve during this day-long event!

Come alone, with a partner, with friends or with family! We will have something for everyone. (Under-18s may attend if accompanied by an adult.)

Who is Playful Pursuits?

We are Bangalore’s first jigsaw puzzle meetup group, providing a space for puzzle enthusiasts to come together to solve jigsaws, swap and sell their puzzles, and compete in speed puzzling!

name: Ceramic Sneaker Postcard Painting with Socially Silly
description:
🎨 Ceramic Sneaker Postcard Painting with Socially Silly👟

Unleash your creativity and bring your dream sneaker to life - on a ceramic postcard!

✨ What to expect:
👟 A unique 3D ceramic sneaker postcard—yours to design!
🖌️ All painting materials provided (just bring your imagination!)
🎨 A chance to paint your dream sneaker with your own custom design
🧠 A relaxing, creative experience perfect for sneakerheads & art lovers alike
🖼️ Take home your one-of-a-kind masterpiece

Let your inner designer shine—no experience needed, just good vibes and creativity!

About the artist:

Socially Silly is a community of friends who thrive on art, craft, fun conversations and shared interests. We organize workshops and silly little art parties that give people the leisure of taking their time exploring their creativity and unwinding. We would like everybody to be able to join us, even if they've never picked up a paintbrush before. We're creating a safe space together to explore and make something with your own hands. Come embrace the mess, the mistakes and get silly with us :)

name: Screening of Pasolini Pa* Palestine (2005) with TPCC
description:
“Pasolini Pa* Palestine is an attempt to repeat Pasolini’s trip to Palestine in his film, It adapts his script into a route map superimposed on the current landscape, creating contradictions and breaks between the visual and the audible, the expected and the real. The video explores the question of repetition. For Heidegger Wiederholung ‘repetition, retrieval’ is one of the terms he uses for the appropriate attitude toward the past. “By the repetition of a basic problem we understand the disclosure of its original, so far hidden possibilities.”

Our meetings consist of a screening of an arthouse film, followed by a discussion. The discussion is led by one of our members or sometimes a guest speaker and encourages members to share their thoughts and interpretations of the film.

Who are The Parallel Cinema Club?

We are a community-run film society based out of Bengaluru and Hyderabad. We are a group of film enthusiasts who meet up to discuss the real world, auteurs, and themes, and occasionally host guest lectures.
